r.d: This package provides support for indexing XML files. It assists you in creating and using such indexes in order to reduce access-time to local XML files.
r.n: Minor fixes : * "Call-time pass-by-reference" warning in XML_Indexing_Builder : fixed, thanks Bertrand Gugger bertrand [at] toggg [dot] com * include_once was used where require_once is more appropriate, in several places : fixed, thanks Bertrand Gugger bertrand [at] toggg [dot] com * Added optional dependency on Benchmark >= 1.2.1, required for profiling
